about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

You’re tasked with taking charge of a struggling DutyCo branch, a global superhero corporation that markets justice and heroism as profitable commodities. Set in the remote US South, in the small city of Meltrock, your mission is clear: rebuild the failing branch, boost the corporation’s ratings, and prove your worth as you climb the ruthless corporate ladder.

BUT...

Your hero roster is a rag-tag band of misfits, from a naive dreamer to a war criminal.

Meanwhile, the city is entangled in a three-way conflict involving the mayor's office, cartel, and terrorists, while nobody counts the casualties.

Your first day on the job starts with a terrorist attack, and your boss probably hates you.

But there's no time to despair, as you also owe the corporation $15,000,000.

How far are you willing to go under such conditions without losing your sanity?

Our story driven superhero corporation manager game delves into a world of gray morality and corruption.

It features tactical missions, base building, diplomacy, complex choices,and intriguing romantic subplots.

Not Just an HQ

Your base takes an active role and lives its own life. Every department you build can be visited, and the building itself impacts your stress level while constantly generating events. From guest and journalist visits to the rise of a union or the appearance of a mysterious killer terrifying your staff, your HQ is never idle.

Characters move around the building, visiting different departments at various times of day. Sometimes, you’ll need to make an effort to catch someone where and when you need them.

Create Your Playstyle

Identical departments stack their power, allowing you to discover unexpected ways to play. Sure, you could fill your base with snipers and drones, blinding, blowing up, and shooting everything in sight. But you could also focus on PR and bot farms, tricking the citizens with fake heroics while pulling off shady deals with villains behind the scenes.

A strong analytics department will let you hunt down wanted criminals for rewards or spot celebrities among civilians to boost your ratings and rake in donations. Achieve success through intelligence and strategy rather than brute force.

Great power doesn’t always come with great responsibility

Yes, every mission has an official objective—but that doesn’t stop a hero at the scene of a crime from spending their time signing autographs for onlookers. Or even stealing a safe full of cash from the very bank they were sent to protect. Ignoring both the criminals and the hostages, of course.

Such behavior won’t go unnoticed. Like every choice you make, it will impact your reputation with the game’s four factions. But how you wield your power is entirely up to you.

Break, Blast, and Electrocute: Your Choices Shape the Battlefield

In our game, you can break walls, uncover wiring and water or gas pipes, and unleash chaos by exploding gas or electrifying spilled water. Combine these elements for powerful chain reactions and massive destruction—all on top of the unique abilities granted by your base and the distinct powers of your heroes.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual Content in the Game
Our game includes elements of sexual context but is not built around them. Erotic tension, nudity, and sexual undertones appear only where they naturally fit into the narrative.

Characters may engage in sexual relationships, discuss sex, or appear nude at moments that align with the story's progression.

Players can choose to avoid such content or actively explore it—the choice is yours.

The game is currently in development, and the level of explicitness regarding sexual content will be adjusted based on feedback from the future publisher and the game’s community.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
